title: My first Pokémon game
author: illymation
description:
▶ Install Raid for Free ✅ IOS/ANDROID/PC: https://clcr.me/Apr_illymation and get a special starter pack 💥 Available only for the next 30 days
▶ MERCH: https://www.hereforthechaos.com
▶ SNEAK PEEKS ON PATREON! http://patreon.com/illymation

ADDITIONAL VOICES/APPEARANCES:
Professor Rowan: TheAmaazing https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ9HvHH-KRYHI5ynj2kbLwQ
Professor's Assistant: Zade http://twitter.com/RealZade
Childhood Friend: SultanSketches https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgmublDj4T0zEP7ngRRGkmg
Commander Mars: PantslessPajamas https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCR0O-1cvuPNxDosvSDLpWHg
Gym doorman: MashUpArt https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfXLxMaNSxvYIoSOBUieKiQ
Oreburgh City workers: AbnormalChaos and Mayhem https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmr3o1qzJCi--KqLaSoQWJg
Friend: AbnormalChaos

▶ BG ARTIST: Ingrid Umbach
http://twitter.com/iumba_
http://instagram.com/iumba
▶ STORYBOARDS/LAYOUT: Abnormal Chaos
https://www.youtube.com/c/AbnormalChaos
▶ AUDIO EDITOR: Hazel TwinkleParks
http://twitter.com/afewbruises
▶ VIDEO EDITOR: Zade
http://twitter.com/RealZade

PROGRAMS USED:
▶ ToonBoom Harmony Premium - to animate
▶ Adobe Photoshop CC - background art / thumbnail
▶ Cintiq 22 HD - screen tablet (but I recommend basic cheap pen tablets from Wacom)
▶ Adobe Premiere CC - to edit and compile

STAY CONNECTED!
▶ https://instagram.com/illymation
▶ https://twitter.com/illymation
▶ https://twitch.tv/illymation
▶ MERCH: https://www.hereforthechaos.com
▶ SECOND CHANNEL: SILLYMATION https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP9IBqJbr6RdNC-orxvzc9A

- I'm sorry, I'm not available to do lines for videos anymore; I've gotten really busy :(

- I am NOT looking for animation or video help! I appreciate your kindness. I'm not in a place where I need to hire people, not even for free.

#illymation #pokemondiamond

localize.description:
▶ 「Raid」を無料でインストール ✅ IOS/ANDROID/PC: https://clcr.me/Apr_illymation、特別なスターターパックをプレゼント 💥 今後30日間限定で利用可能
▶ MERCH: https://www.hereforthechaos.com
▶ Patreonでスニークピークを公開！ http://patreon.com/illymation

追加ボイス/出演者
ローワン教授：TheAmaazing https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ9HvHH-KRYHI5ynj2kbLwQ
教授のアシスタント：Zade http://twitter.com/RealZade
幼馴染。SultanSketches https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgmublDj4T0zEP7ngRRGkmg
コマンダー・マーズ PantslessPajamas https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCR0O-1cvuPNxDosvSDLpWHg
ジムのドアマン：MashUpArt https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfXLxMaNSxvYIoSOBUieKiQ
Oreburgh Cityの労働者。AbnormalChaos and Mayhem https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmr3o1qzJCi--KqLaSoQWJg
友達。AbnormalChaos

▶BG ARTIST: イングリッド・ウンバッハ
http://twitter.com/iumba_
http://instagram.com/iumba
▶ 絵コンテ・レイアウト Abnormal Chaos
https://www.youtube.com/c/AbnormalChaos
▶ オーディオエディター：Hazel TwinkleParks
http://twitter.com/afewbruises
▶ ビデオ・エディター：Zade
http://twitter.com/RealZade

使用したプログラム
▶ ToonBoom Harmony Premium - アニメート用
▶ Adobe Photoshop CC - 背景アート／サムネイル用
▶ Cintiq 22 HD - スクリーンタブレット（ただし、ワコムの基本的な安いペンタブレットがおすすめ
▶ Adobe Premiere CC - 編集・編集用

stay connected!
▶ https://instagram.com/illymation
▶ https://twitter.com/illymation
▶ https://twitch.tv/illymation
▶ MERCH: https://www.hereforthechaos.com
▶セカンドチャンネル：sillymation https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP9IBqJbr6RdNC-orxvzc9A

- 申し訳ありませんが、私はもう動画のセリフを書くことができません。

- 私はアニメーションやビデオの助けを求めているわけではありません。あなたの親切に感謝しています。人を雇わなければならない状況ではありません、無料でもありません。

#illymation #pokemondiamond
localize.title: 初めてのポケモンゲーム

localize.description:
▶免费安装Raid ✅ IOS/ANDROID/PC: https://clcr.me/Apr_illymation，并获得一个特殊的启动包 💥仅在未来30天内可用。
▶商品：https://www.hereforthechaos.com
▶在PATREON上偷看！http://patreon.com/illymation

额外的声音/出场。
Rowan教授：TheAmaazing https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ9HvHH-KRYHI5ynj2kbLwQ
教授的助手：Zade http://twitter.com/RealZade
童年的朋友。SultanSketches https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgmublDj4T0zEP7ngRRGkmg
火星指挥官。PantslessPajamas https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCR0O-1cvuPNxDosvSDLpWHg
健身房门卫: MashUpArt https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfXLxMaNSxvYIoSOBUieKiQ
奥雷堡市工人。AbnormalChaos and Mayhem https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmr3o1qzJCi--KqLaSoQWJg
朋友。AbnormalChaos

▶ BG艺术家。Ingrid Umbach
http://twitter.com/iumba_
http://instagram.com/iumba
故事板/布局。异常混乱
https://www.youtube.com/c/AbnormalChaos
▶音频编辑：Hazel TwinkleParks
http://twitter.com/afewbruises
▶视频编辑：Zade
http://twitter.com/RealZade

使用的程序。
▶ ToonBoom Harmony Premium - 用于制作动画
▶ Adobe Photoshop CC - 背景艺术/缩略图
▶ Cintiq 22 HD - 屏幕平板电脑（但我推荐Wacom公司的基本廉价钢笔平板电脑）。
▶ Adobe Premiere CC - 用于编辑和编排

保持联系!
▶ https://instagram.com/illymation
▶ https://twitter.com/illymation
▶ https://twitch.tv/illymation
▶市场：https://www.hereforthechaos.com
▶第二频道：Sillymation https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP9IBqJbr6RdNC-orxvzc9A

- 很抱歉，我现在不能为视频做台词了，我真的很忙:(

- 我并不是在寻找动画或视频方面的帮助! 我感谢你的好意。我不是在一个需要雇人的地方，甚至不是免费的。

#illymation #pokemondiamond
